cs.ualberta.ca.medlog.controller

Class ElasticSearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.ualberta.ca.medlog.controller.ElasticSearchController

  • public class ElasticSearchController
extends java.lang.Object

    Elastic Search Controller

    Description:
    The purpose of this class is to interact directly with the Elastic Search server and query information.

    See Also:
    Database
